channel.title: Speeding up wireless?
channel.description: Ugghhh I hate wireless and want it to die. But it's the only way for a computer in my room. Any one know how to speed it up in getting really slow speeds.

item.title: Speeding up wireless?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

cow821:

Thanks it’s in my desk pocket thing i’ll moce it hopefully it will do better(No one has wireless on my street geeks).

Any luck? I’m interested in knowing, because I have had soo many problems with wireless when I first got it.

Read full topic

item.title: Speeding up wireless?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Use a cd as a reflector.

Read full topic

item.title: Speeding up wireless?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Check with your ISP your download speed. Make sure your wireless is secure so no one can connect to it and download, that is the main reason wireless’s can go slow. Turn off all other pc’s in the house to see if that helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Speeding up wireless?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:4, topic:30737”]It couldnt go through a computer desk? WTF!!! lol… my router goes through 3 houses… i steal my neighbours internets!

They have a well good connection i use it to play warrock. But i use my homes router because the neighbours get angry.[/quote]

Same… Infact I can get it on the next street down. It’s just that when there is anything really close to it it doesnt work… it goes through 3 stories in my house right now just fine with a 100% link quality…

Read full topic

item.title: Speeding up wireless?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

It couldnt go through a computer desk? WTF!!! lol… my router goes through 3 houses… i steal my neighbours internets!

They have a well good connection i use it to play warrock. But i use my homes router because the neighbours get angry.

Read full topic

item.title: Speeding up wireless?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

If you have a bad link quality, either get newer hardware, or get an access point.

I found out the cause my my bad connectio was my computer desk, for some reason it couldn’t go through my desk. Try moving it.

Read full topic

item.title: Speeding up wireless?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

You can’t speed up wireless but you can speed up your connection… buy faster internet!

Read full topic
